metadata.name: The Child
metadata.description:
Being a child in mountain villages
I was leaving the house of a poor family that I visited in a mountain village.While I was walking down the hillside where the house was built,I heard his voice asking,“Will you come back again” I turned back and saw his eyes
I never forgot that moment and went there again and again.His look elevated me to a journey of feelings. It made me narrate stories
The Child earned Gold Medal in the competition dedicated to Ansel Adams at HIPA, known through its world’s highest participation.In the same competition it was awarded The Grand Prize
The Child was selected as one of the best 12 photography in the competition of Hahnemühle organized for its 435th anniversary.It was exhibited by Hahnemühle in nearly 20 countries and accepted in its Collection 
The artwork took its place at the opening exhibition of World Photography Fair, Photokina
It earned numerous awards including 5 gold medals at competitions approved by World Photography Federation FIAP and PSA
